definition[0]: an action, event etc that is decisive has a big effect on the way that something develops
example[0]: Women can play a decisive role in the debate over cloning.
example[1]: We will take decisive steps towards political union with Europe.
definition[1]: someone who is decisive is good at making decisions quickly and with confidence
example[3]: a talent for quick decisive action
definition[2]: definite and clear in a way that leaves no doubt
example[4]: The answer was a decisive no.
